name: Shewee Flexi Urinating Device - Women's
description: Keep your layers on when nature calls. The Shewee Flexi lets you go standing up, without stripping down. No more limiting your fluid intake to avoid a trailside pitstop.Larger, more flexible version of the classic Shewee.Included extension pipe to adapt to bulky clothing or climbing harness.Made of recyclable polyolefin.
